summary: Presentation Designer with a background in customer service and retail, specializing in design and technology. Team-oriented with strong collaborative skills and a track record of achieving personal sales goals; proficient in creating engaging graphics and multimedia content.

experience.title: Presentation Designer
experience.description: Designing Keynote and PowerPoint slides; creating graphic assets for presentations; animating slides; conceptualizing and visualizing clients' briefs/scripts into storyboards; collaborating with producers to deliver presentations before deadlines.

experience.title: Multimedia Designer
experience.description: Create marketing or product tutorial videos (storyboards, audio, video shooting and editing); catalog/brochure design; marketing collateral, online banners, and print advertising; collaborate with project teams to plan, analyze, organize, and complete projects; design and develop marketing materials for campaigns, events, and internal communications; work with Jesus House Dallas team on design requests.

experience.title: User Experience and User Interaction Designer (Team Lead)
experience.description: Lead project team to develop UX; translate business objectives and user requirements into site blueprints; website evaluation and benchmarking; gather information, identify user types and needs; define user scenarios, goals, tasks, and customer journeys; create site maps, navigation, wireframes, user journeys/process flows, and specifications; prototyping and usability testing; develop implementation guidelines; ensure high-quality deliverables.

experience.title: Customer care and Digital media
experience.description: Worked with MTN Nigeria Systems and Processes to ensure product launches meet quality standards; performed UATs and FUTs; supported product lifecycle; developed requirements; researched new products; produced awareness videos; tracked cases and metrics; designed information packs and FAQs; monitored product performance; contributed to MTN HR Career Portal and MTN MNP teaser animation.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
